summary: ContinueAsNew workflow transitions are incorrectly appearing as errors in OpenTelemetry traces, causing unnecessary noise and confusion in observability data.
userImpact: Users see spurious error traces for normal ContinueAsNew workflow transitions, complicating debugging and increasing noise in monitoring systems.
rootCause: ContinueAsNew completion is being treated as an error condition in the OpenTelemetry tracing instrumentation.
resolutionDetails: ContinueAsNew is now properly handled as a normal workflow lifecycle event rather than an error in OTEL traces.
keyQuote: It's quite irritating to see this error in my workflow traces
